title: White House backs bipartisan bill that could be used to ban TikTok
description: A bipartisan group of senators introduced a sweeping bill Tuesday that would allow the federal government to regulate and even ban foreign-produced technology, including TikTok.

title: TikTok will offer some creators the ability to put premium content behind a paywall
description: TikTok announced it was rolling out a new feature called 'Series,' which allows creators to put their premium content behind a paywall.

title: Hundreds of sexual deepfake ads using Emma Watson's face ran on Facebook and Instagram
description: A deepfake app advertised itself on Meta platforms using the faces of actresses Emma Watson and Scarlett Johansson swapped into sexual videos.

title: Gigi Sohn withdraws from running for FCC commissioner
description: Gigi Sohn, a consumer advocate who faced an unprecedented wave of personal attacks, has withdrawn her candidacy to join the Federal Communications Commission.

title: Elon Musk takes aim at a Twitter employee who was let go, claims he 'did no actual work'
description: Elon Musk took aim at a disabled former Twitter employee on Monday who tagged him in a tweet to ask if he'd been laid off.

title: Jim Jordan subpoenas former head of DHS disinformation board
description: The House Judiciary Committee chairman called on Nina Jankowicz to sit for a deposition on the now-defunct board that drew GOP scrutiny before it shut down.
